metadata.title: Top Data Scientists to follow on Twitter in 2020 | by Benedict Neo | Towards Data Science
metadata.h1: Top Data Scientists to follow on Twitter in 2020
metadata.description: Data Scientists on Twitter, Top data Scientists to follow on twitter

all_paragraphs: Twitter in one sentence is — “what’s happening in the world and what people are talking about.” It’s one of the media’s chattiest technology and leading social media platforms of the 21st century. With a whopping 335 million monthly active users (MAUs), it’s also the place where memes go viral and people’s opinions are shared with the entire world.

Instead of using Twitter as a pleasure mechanism that distracts you from deep work and be overwhelmed by this carefully engineered product which preys on your attention, why not transform it into a platform for learning and exploring new ideas?

Data Science will play a vital role in the future and will even help save the world from climate change. As the surge of Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) perpetuates, it’s crucial that everyone, from youngsters to AI experts, is updated about the latest news regarding AI. And what better place to do that than Twitter?

In this article, I have compiled a list of prominent Data Scientists on Twitter which I believe have made significant contributions to the world of Data Science and brought forth this magnificent revolution.
Without them, the Big four tech companies today — Google, Amazon, Facebook, Apple (GAFA) — would not achieve the progress in AI and ML made today.

One of the best ways to learn a new topic is by picking from experts. If you’re someone who wants to get into the field, why not follow these Data Scientists and get a peek into what it’s like working on the field. By following them, you procure a share of their experiences, tools they use, posts and articles they found insightful, meetups, conferences, etc in your feed.

Without further ado, here is the list of the 33 Data scientists to follow on Twitter. They are not in any particular order. Get introduced to the top names in Data Science on Twitter and follow them now if you haven’t already.
Founder of Pandas and author of Python for Data Analysis
Professor at NYU, Chief AI Scientist at Facebook
Co-founder and Chief Data Scientist, SmarterHQ
Principal Data Scientist at Booz Allen
Chief ML Scientist & Head of Machine Learning/AI at SIG, Data Science Faculty-Berkeley
Machine Learning, AI, Data Science Exec & Investor
Director at Facebook AI, former Googler, and professor.
Scientist lead for the machine learning team, Google DeepMind
Professor of Computer Science, Stanford University
Founder and CEO, Bernard Marr & Co
Former general manager for machine learning, Clouder
Chief Data Scientist at O’Reilly Media
Founder and Executive Director of DataKing
Business and data strategist, Data-Mania LLC
Author of R for Data Science
Data Scientist/Research Engineer at Riot Games
President of KDnuggets, LinkedIn Top Voice on Data Science & Analytics

I hope you enjoyed this article and I managed to convince you to declutter your Twitter feed. Social media is eating up our lives and if you don’t find a way to transform it into a place of learning, you will soon be consumed by it. So, start filtering out the noise, and let quality information enter your life, and watch as you change, one tweet at a time.
If clicking into them one by one is toilsome, and you’re a busy person, then head over to my profile and find them there on this Twitter list!
Check out my article on Best TED talks on Data Science
If you want to be updated with my latest articles follow me on Medium.
Happy tweeting, happy learning, and happy coding.
Your home for data science. A Medium publication sharing concepts, ideas and codes.
I write Data Science tutorials and share the best resources for learning
